A simple game to pass the time
Those who help make EDGE happen

Situated amid a lush green campus in the heart of the city of joy, Kolkata, Techno Main Salt lake is an Engineering and Management college, affiliated to MAKAUT, and approved by AICTE. The college ranks among the top engineering colleges of West Bengal and is known for providing wholesome development to students. With a brilliant team of faculty members and a wonderful infrastructure, it succeeds in catering to all the needs of young students and developing them into responsible citizens of our society.

The Science and Technology club of Techno Main Salt Lake - Geekonix, was established in September 2005 to inspire young minds and promote unconventional and out-of-the-box thinking. Ever since its inception, Geekonix has been paving the way for bright and zealous enthusiasts of technology, helping them innovate and create all the while learning important management skills. The club provides a platform for the students to hone their technical skills and through a medium of friendly competitions, a spirit of innovation and creativity is promoted which in turn leads to the overall development of knowledge in all fields of technology.

EDGE – the annual techno-management festival of Techno Main Salt Lake is organised every year by Geekonix, the science and technology club. EDGE provides an excellent platform for students all over the city and beyond to put their technical skills of diverse fields to test. Amidst an environment of intense competition, coupled with fun-filled and light-hearted evenings, EDGE succeeds in bringing out the true spirit of technological advancement. A plethora of events lined up over a 3-day series enhances the knowledge of the participants and helps bring out the best and fiercest version of themselves, as they go beyond their imagination and compete with their peers.
Coming soon in a later update.
To register for EDGE events, visit the site below.

Failed to fetch the list of sponsors

Hello all social butterflies out there, who are not students of TMSL, but are intrigued to be a part of Eastern India's 2nd largest techno-management fest, EDGE. Don't worry, as EDGE is proud to announce the kickoff of its highly anticipated Campus Ambassador programme.
\Why, you ask? What's in it for me? Glad you asked. This programme entails the following for the Campus Ambassadors:

1) Imbue leadership and management skills.
2) The top 10 CAs get assured e-certificates.
3) A chance to win exciting gifts and accessories
4) The top 5 Campus Ambassadors will get certificates along with goodies. 
5) The top 3 CAs will get goodies, certificates, and a recommendation letter from the teacher convenor of our Technical Committee, as well as a LinkedIn recommendation from our official page.
6) Exciting goodies at the end of every month for the highest point scorers. 
7) The entire system of how to score points will be explained through a meeting, which will be held after we declare our final list of CAs.
8) An unparalleled experience of associating with EDGE.
If you are already a Campus Ambassador, log in above with the same Google account used to fill the registration form.
This account does not belong to a Campus Ambassador. If you are already a Campus Ambassador, log in above with the same Google account used to fill the registration form.
